trigger alert based off value from alert query. Alerts will be triggered with these validator types:\n- Not Null - When the return value is Not NULL, Empty, or 0\n- Operator - When `sql_return_value comparison_operator threshold` is True e.g. `50 <= 75`<br>Supports the comparison operators <, <=, >, >=, ==, and !=","enum":["not null","operator"],"type":"string"},"working_timeout":{"description":"If an alert is staled at a working state, how long until it's state is reset to error","example":3600,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"}},"required":["crontab","name","type"],"type":"object","title":"ReportScheduleRestApi.post"}}},"description":"Report Schedule schema","required":true}}
